concept.title: Updating Program Dates

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Use the Update Program Dates feature to change a program's start or end date, reschedule billing periods, and validate date overlaps via the Update Program Dates dialog.

othermeta.name: usecase
othermeta.content: adjust program effective dates and billing schedules while validating overlaps and constraints

conbody.p: The Update Program Dates feature is used when the agreement’s end date is updated to a prior date than originally activated with or if the agreement end date is extended.
Perform the following steps to update programs:

ol.li: Click Update Program Dates.The Update Program Dates dialog box appears.
Enable Change Program End Date to Agreement End Date toggle to enable the toggles of each program that is associated with the Agreement.

Click Apply.
All programs and their associated objects such as products and participants are also updated.

conbody.p: Programs with end dates earlier than the agreement’s original end date are unaffected. You can also update the date of individual program by enabling the respective programs toggle.

note.p: Program Start and End Dates must be greater than or equal to and less than or equal to Agreement Start and End Dates.

conbody.p: When program dates are extended or updated to a prior date through the agreement, the agreement and each program being updated are versioned. After edits are complete, the analyst Activates the agreement which in turn activates all associated programs. Any program not being updated available in its original status.
When the program end date is reduced, the section, qualifications & benefits, and participants dates are changed with the new program end date if:

ul.li: Old Section end date = Old Program end date
Old Section end date < Old Program end date & Old Section end date > New Program end date
Qualifications & Benefits end date = Section end date
Old Participants end date = Old Program end date
Old Participants end date < Old Program end date & Old Participants end date > New Program end date

conbody.p: When the program end date is extended, the section, qualifications & benefits, and participants dates are changed with the new program end date if the old section end date = old program end date.
You can view the program end date highlighted in Red color and icon with the error message in the tooltip if:

ul.li: New Program End Date < MAX of Section Start Date
New Program End Date < MAX of Benefit Start Date
New Program End Date < MAX of Participant Start Date
New Program End Date < End Date of the last Ready/Closed schedule
